mosinstall.name: Sections
mosinstall.author: Mambo Foundation
mosinstall.description: The Section module shows a list of all Sections configured in your database. The Sections refer here to the Item Sections only. If the configuration 'Show Unauthorized Links' is set to 'NO', the list will be limited to the sections the user is allowed to see.

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (default is 5)

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
